title: FS: Signed T205 Bill Carrigan BVG/JSA
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: Signed T205 Bill Carrigan BVG/JSA
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains033/T205Carrigan_zpsd93cc6f0.jpg[/IMG]

Mr. Carrigan is looking for a more permanent home. I am entertaining offers on this signed T205. A similar example sold at Heritage for over $1400. Signed T-cards continue to bring strong/record prices.

Please PM with offers/questions.

Tom C
